src:
Moncer di AS Roma, Chris Smalling Laris Manis di Italia
04 Nov 2019, 18:35 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Spekulasi masa depan Chris Smalling kembali menemui sebuah persimpangan. Bek milik Manchester United itu diberitakan mendapatkan tawaran untuk membela sejumlah klub top Italia selain AS Roma.
Pada musim panas ini, Smalling terpaksa mengungsi ke AS Roma. Ia kalah bersaing dengan bek-bek MU lainnya, sehingga ia pindah ke Italia untuk mendapatkan jam bermain.
Beberapa pekan terakhir, Smalling menjadi buah bibir di Italia. Ia menunjukkan performa yang sangat impresif di jantung pertahanan Il Lupi, sehingga Roma berencana untuk mempermanenkan sang bek.
Namun Il Tempo mengabarkan bahwa Roma bukan satu-satunya klub Italia yang tertarik merekrut Smalling. Ada beberapa klub top Italia yang ingin merekrut sang bek.

Klub mana sajakah yang ingin mengamankan jasa Smalling? Baca informasinya di bawah ini.
text:
Moncer in AS Roma, Chris Smalling Selling Well in Italy
Nov 04 2019, 18:35 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Speculation the future of Chris Smalling again met an intersection. Manchester United's defender was reportedly getting offers to defend a number of top Italian clubs besides AS Roma.
This summer, Smalling was forced to flee to AS Roma. He was unable to compete with other Manchester United defenders, so he moved to Italy to get playing hours.
In the last few weeks, Smalling has become a byword in Italy. He showed a very impressive performance at the heart of Il Lupi's defense, so Roma plan to keep the defender secure.
But Il Tempo reported that Roma were not the only Italian club interested in recruiting Smalling. There are some top Italian clubs who want to recruit the defender.

Which club wants to secure Smalling services? Read the information below.
